components.name: orders
components.description: Provides REST API endpoints for order management.

components.name: processor
components.description: Handles payment processing for the e-commerce API.

Create a New Order.description: This endpoint allows users to create a new order by providing order items, shipping address, and payment method.

steps.description: Send POST request to '/api/orders/create' with request body containing order items, shipping address, and payment method.
Validate the response to ensure order creation was successful.

Get Order Details.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific order by its ID. Users can only access their own orders.

steps.description: Send GET request to '/api/orders/{order_id}' where {order_id} is the unique identifier of the order.
Verify the user's authorization to access the order.
Validate the response to ensure the order details were retrieved successfully.

List User Orders.description: This endpoint lists all orders for the current user, supporting pagination via limit and offset parameters.

steps.description: Send GET request to '/api/orders/' with optional query parameters limit and offset.
Validate the response to ensure the list of orders was retrieved successfully.

Cancel an Order.description: This endpoint allows users to cancel a pending order. Orders that are processing or shipped cannot be cancelled.

steps.description: Send POST request to '/api/orders/{order_id}/cancel' where {order_id} is the unique identifier of the order.
Verify the user's authorization to cancel the order.
Validate the response to ensure the order cancellation was successful.
